turkish_example_sentence: Onlar gerekli belgeleyi hastaneye vermediklerinde, tedavi ertelendi.
english_example_sentence: When they did not give the necessary documents to the hospital, the treatment was postponed.
russian_example_sentence: Когда они не дали необходимые документы в больницу, лечение было отложено.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Onlar gerekli belgeleyi hastaneye ______, tedavi ertelendi.
